name: Cool Cats Clicker
description:
A fan-made clicker game inspired by pet care simulators and the incredible Cool Cats NFT Community. This game was built as a submission to the Cool Pets Allowlist together with the artworks in the screenshots! Please enjoy the therapeutic gameplay! :)

Not a Cool Cats Holder but I really wish to become one someday :> 
View my contest submission here: https://twitter.com/sethkhaw/status/1485064707958800385?s=20

Developed this game over the past 2 days by myself, wanted to create a unique experience as part of the Cool Cats universe and figured why not feed some fishes!

PS: All rights go to Cool Cats NFT. No copyright infringement intended. This is a passion project that does not profit over its usage. Apart from the cat heads, I designed, developed, and scripted all other assets, animations, and game mechanics of the minigame myself. Follow the Cool Cats Community on Discord here!

Developed By:

Seth Khaw
User Experience & Game Design undergrad at DigiPen Singapore
